attributes.review: You know, the other day I was just hanging out and randomly had the amazing idea to download the Trump 2020 app. Now I LOVE Trumo, my favorite parts about him being his deep hatred of minorities and the way he‚Äôs saving out country and souls from the evil satanist libtards! However, this app really didn‚Äôt do it for me (title drop). First off, when I downloaded the app it asked me to input my skin color to check if I was white. This was the best part of the app for me, because it can filter out all of those libtards and minorities who are sneaking onto the app and then leave absurd 1 star reviews. Next though, the app summoned a group of cockroaches (mentioned in previous reviews) to my house. I told my white conservative family that I could handle the bugs, but they proceeded to charge my whole white conservative family and tried to eat us alive! We barely fought them off and although we got away, we all had major life threatening injuries. I knew I would have to deal with these injuries immediately, as everyone in my white conservative family had had one or both of their arms cut off. So, I rushed to grab a bible and prayed for our health. As an intelligent conservative, I know better than to trust the liberal propaganda that is western medicine. Unfortunately, Jesus didn‚Äôt do too much for our wounds, although he did save our souls, and collectively lost 12 arms. Anyways, I wasn‚Äôt to happy about that feature of the app. Please change it so it‚Äôs more accessible to non cockroach tamers.
attributes.title: Didn‚Äôt do it for me
